A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Better than TFA. Audiovisualy amazing. Pretty good writing. One completely unnecessary plotline of Finn and Rose. Very strange main plotline as well. Not a huge deal. But having to burn fuel to keep the speed IN SPACE?! Ever heard something like: \"An object in motion will remain in motion unless acted upon by another force.\"? They are in vacuum! WTF? Rey and Luke is interesting but little boring. Less unnecessary persuasion. You can get that done just as well under five minutes. More scenes with training. Snoke went out really early. I liked the way it was done\, his arrogance killing him. Fine\, but it could have been way more interesting. Luke shouldn´t have died. Just no. He should have distracted Kylo with projection and then lived to finish Rey´s training. And maybe start another Jedi academy with the restored hope and learned lessons. Also Yoda was pretty bad. Some people may have liked him\, but it just seemed weird.  They tried to emulate that crazy Yoda from Empire before he revealed himself. But after that he wasn´t super joking semi insane frog. Some more cannon breaking with force ghosts being able to affect the physical world also didn´t help. Oh and he somehow looks worse than in ROTJ. Enjoyable but had so much more potential...
